name: Steelskull

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in Faction Crypts by 27%

skills.name: Decay
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 10% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Cleansing Spell
skills.raw_description:
Removes all debuffs from a target ally, then heals them by 40%.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Protection
skills.raw_description:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Heals all allies by 20% of their MAX HP.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Skinwalkers
faction.default_description: Skinwalkers is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 23 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Skinwalkers is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 18 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: As told by the tragic legend of Ch'arocah, Skinwalkers once had the power to cast themselves in the form of any man or beast. But after centuries of overuse, these shamans found themselves entrapped as something less than human, but more than animal. Though wild and dangerous, they can sense evil and may act to prevent it

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Steelskull is a epic assist champion from the faction Skinwalkers doing spirit damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Skinwalkers, Steelskull is a champion of Epic rarity and of Assist type
structured_data.name: Steelskull

default_description: Steelskull is a epic assist champion from the faction Skinwalkers doing spirit damage
